titleStmt.title: These most miraculous neck-laces being so well known, and approved of both in city and country, the virtues of the same being so large, thought fit as in duty I was bound to my fellow Christians to revive this worthy annodyne, ...
titleStmt.author: Choke, John.

notesStmt.note: Title taken from first lines of text.
Author and imprint suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
